snippet.title: Knights of Pen and Paper 3 Announcement - Paradox Arc
snippet.description:
The third installment of the most EPICEST RPG Adventure releases on March 7th!

Gather your party of imaginary friends who pretend to be imaginary wizards and paladins and embark on a quest! Fight monsters that were minding their own business, complete quests for NPCs that really should pay you more for your efforts, and become heroes in your own right!

Buy Now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2129470

Paradox on YouTube:
---------------------------------
ParadoxInteractive - http://youtube.com/ParadoxInteractive
Trailers, Feature Breakdowns, Dev Diaries, and more.

Paradox Grand Strategy - http://youtube.com/ParadoxGrandStrategy
Gameplay of our Grand Strategy Games. CK3, EU4 and HOI4.
